main event: On the evening of 14 Aug. 1962, a patrol car observed a large, glowing metallic object in Curaco.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter and glowing with a reddish-orange hue., Several smaller objects were seen leaving and returning to the main craft., The observation lasted for several hours., Investigators were unable to approach the object due to intense heat., There is insufficient data for evaluation of the sighting.
sighted object: a large metallic object glowing reddish-orange
